about_the_game:
Discover the good position of country flags, swapped between them during the draw, within 7 attempts maximum per match, with the help of the position of the flags played to previous attempts, bonus flags and these clues...

• a green chip by flag in wrong position to previous attempts,

• a red chip by flag in good position to previous attempts,

• a blue chip by flag in good position of your best attempt

and win at the end of the match...

⇒ a prize for the attempt with the BEST DISCOVERY, in addition to,

⇒ a prize for the COMPLETE DISCOVERY, in addition to,

⇒ a progresive Jackpot for the COMPLETE DISCOVERY to SUCCESSIVE matches.

Casino games do not offer 100% chance of winning, however it is possible to frequently get a prize, with Bennaction it is also possible to get the jackpot following a winning streak.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10 - 32/64 bits
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i3 CPU 2.50 GHz
  • Memory: 150 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 1366 x 768 pixels or higher resolution
  • Storage: 18 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: For amusement only, ideal for PC

short_description: Set off a new wave for casino games of which Bennaction has the scoop. In the atmosphere of Las Vegas, get ready to choose your jackpot, draw, bets and selections with the help of clues revealed over the attempts to discover the mystery combination of the match.
